description: There are only a few selected things that spell class. The brilliant collection of shower faucets by Hindware is one such beauty that renders you a showering experience like none other. A soulful unison of artistic features and superior performance – every shower is crafted to give you a refreshing shower after a hard day. From overhead massage showers to round rain showers – each style, cut and curve lends you a unique experience; turning your everyday showers into a royal affair.

name: Flora Angular Stop Cock

Finished in gentle curves, the Flora range of faucets mimics the elegant and soft lines displayed in a flower and the gracefulness with which it blooms. They are designed to make the water distribution in modern bathrooms a whole lot simpler and yet compact, thereby keeping the aesthetics of your bathroom a notch higher than others.
